title: WTB: Low to mid grade T206 Buffalo players
author: cardsmemro

posts.post_title: WTB: Low to mid grade T206 Buffalo players
posts.post_content:
These players are: Dave Brain, Fred Burchell, Bill Clancy, Steamer Flanagan, Rube Kissinger, Bill Malarky, Billy Nattress, George Schrim, Heinie Smith, Dummy Taylor & Jack White.

Thank you!
Just giving this a bump. Thanks!
